document.full_text: europe is considering "stress testing" its nuclear power stations to check they can cope with crises, while its energy chief on tuesday even raised the prospect of a nuclear-free future.
document.title: eu mulls nuclear-free future, tests on reactors
lines_and_colors: europe is considering "stress testing" its nuclear power stations to check they can cope with crises, while its energy chief on tuesday even raised the prospect of a nuclear-free future.
